Class InteractiveRole

java.lang.Object
InteractiveRole
Direct Known Subclasses:
Applicant, HR
public abstract class InteractiveRole extends Object
An abstract class that represents roles that are interactive (requires user input etc.), which includes the HR class and Applicant class
